name: arrayReduce
description: Iterates over every entry of the array and calls the closure to work on the elements of the array. This function will reduce the array to a single value and will return the value.

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration.

callback_params.description: The result of the reduce operation after the previous iteration
callback_params.name: result

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: The current index for the iteration
callback_params.name: index

callback_params.description: A reference of the original array
callback_params.name: array

params.name: initialValue
params.description: Initial value which will be used for the reduce operation.

links.title: Practical uses for reduce functions
links.description: Blog entry by John Whish covering some practical uses for reduce functions in CFML.

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have

examples.title: Simple arrayReduce Example
examples.description: Sum each `a` element in the array
